description: The proposal consists of a single-storey part-width rear extension at second floor level and creation of a roof terrace at second floor level with associated railings, installation of double-glazed timber French doors to provide access to the second floor balcony and the replacement of first floor windows within the rear facade.
decision_conditions:
PRIVACY SCREENS (DETAILS):  Details of a privacy screen separating the roof terrace hereby approved from the neighbouring property shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority prior to their installation. 

The screen shall be installed prior to the first use of the terrace hereby approved and the development shall be carried out strictly in accordance with the details so approved and shall be maintained as such thereafter. 

REASON:  To prevent undue overlooking (oblique, backwards or otherwise) of neighbouring habitable room windows and also to ensure that the resulting visual screen is acceptable in terms of its appearance.
